name: Ave Maria - Ave Maria - Knights Templar
additionalNotes: Ave Maria is an exclusive cigar made in Nicaragua that is considered by many to be one of the highest quality per-dollar cigars available. Full-bodied and wonderfully balanced, Ave Maria is crafted using spicy Nicaraguan long fillers and binders, and then finished with a heavily fermented Ecuadorian sun-grown habano wrapper leaf. This is a very special cigar aimed at experienced aficionados. Ave Maria Lionheart is rolled at Tabacalera A.J. Fernandez Cigars de Nicaragua in Estelí, Nicaragua. The blend uses a Sun-Grown wrapper, Nicaraguan binder, and Brazilian, Mexican, and Nicaraguan fillers.
